item.title: Lessons, learnings and gratitude - 2023
item.description: Back in January of this year, I had promised to write as much as possible this year. Naturally, I clasped at every opportunity to write and share my thoughts on almost everything - personal and professional. And while we are wrapping up this year, itâ€™s only fitting that I end the year with a blog. In this piece, I share most of the things I have learned and picked up this year.
